devdoc.title: Manage energy investments for Virtual Power Plant

addPendingWithdrawals(address).notice: add withdrawals, transfer from outstanding dividend to eachindividual investor

getInvestorInvestment(address,uint256).notice: retrieve investment amount for a particular investment, becausemultiple are available per user, submit index too

triggerDividend().notice: admin can trigger a dividend to be paid out to investors
